author: curiousbean28
comment: IPA comes first then you will need to apply Student pass. For IPA, school will apply on behalf of student if I’m not wrong, then sch will send you link to make appointment at ICA office. So you will need to wait to get an IPA email first.

author: Handrwik
comment: For International students, I just finished enrolment by submitting documents.

author: curiousbean28
comment: have you received enrollment package email already?

author: Handrwik
comment: Thanks for the information. I’ve already completed the document submission stage after online enrolment. And yeah, I received the enrollment package after my course offer, but the guide includes all the details without a clear order. That’s why I’m unsure about the next steps, like how to get the IPA letter. I’m also waiting for an email from the polytechnic and have no idea what to do next. For that reason, I am here to seeking help. Really appreciate your help.

author: curiousbean28
comment: oh i see! IPA letter and student pass application stage dont take long. It only takes like mostly two weeks or three weeks. Don’t worry about it. I would like to advise to prepare medical records first if u r still in your home country. you can pm me for further information also!!
